name: Explorer III
description:
In this Swedish text adventure, you are Indiana Jones, and it is up to you to recover King Arthur's sword, the Excalibur. The area you are in is filled with dangers such as lions, crocodiles, quicksand and tarantulas, and you are only armed with a compass. The area contains both old castles and a pyramid, as well as a mysterious forest.

Although the game is entirely text-based, apart from the title screen, it does have sound effects.
gamePlay: Interactive fiction / text adventure, Puzzle elements

shot.caption: You stand in a forest in front of a large rock
You find a knife near the creek
